---
title: "Toolik Biochemistry Data"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
# read in data and clean names
toolik_biochem <- read_csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na = c(".", "NA")) |>
  janitor::clean_names()

#view(toolik_biochem)

# create a subset of observations from Toolik Inlet site
inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem %>% 
  filter(site == "Toolik Inlet") %>% 
  dplyr::select(p_h, doc_u_m, tdn_u_m) 

view(inlet_biochem)

# calculate mean for each column 

# method 1:
mean_val <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = ncol(inlet_biochem))
  
for (i in 1:ncol(inlet_biochem)){
  mean_val[i] <- mean(inlet_biochem[[i]], na.rm = TRUE)
}

mean_val

# method 2: 
apply(X = inlet_biochem, MARGIN = 2, FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)
```
